page.title: 20CREDITS-WEST NOTTINGHAM.
page.content: Our thanks to the West Nottingham Group:- Ambleside Junior-John Hudson, Janet Johnson, Phil Unsworth, Pauline Wilson; Heathfield Junior-Mrs.P.Barker; Hempshill Hall Junior-Stuart Harrison; Southwark Junior-Ann Ashley; Ellis Guilford Comprehensive-David Turner,Phil Robinson,Angela Sanchez,Ellen Carman,Julia Eames,Lorraine Stapleton,Lynne Hawkes and Gillian Rhodes; Player Comprehensive School-Roger Samples, Graham Drury and Martin Speight. Thanks also to the pupils of our schools-who did all the foot-work throughout the summer of 1985 A.D.
